venue.name: Mass Central Rail Trail Parking Lot

item.description:
Let's do another hike on the Mass Central Rail Trail before the snow comes.
We'll go about 3 miles each way (or more if we want).

Afterwords we'll go to Finder's Pub for lunch.
Finder's Pub is located at 171 West Boylston St.(Rt. 12) in West Boylston.
If you can't make the hike then join us for lunch at around 12:30.
Please let me know if you plan on joining us for "lunch only" on your RSVP so I'll know how many to expect.

Please note: ALL of my meet ups don't have Maybe's on the rsvp choices because I want to know for sure how many people are going to show up and too many "maybe's" are just "no-shows".
If you have to, rsvp by 7am on the day of the hike.
If it's raining on Saturday We can do it on Sunday

As always, feel free to call me if you are lost, can't find the group, or are running late.
My # (508) 212-4111.

Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Black Suzuki Burgman (Scooter) with a meet up sign
item.name: Hike on The Mass Central Rail Trail
